name: Felix chair | Lovit
description: Accent velvet armchair on wooden legs in the spirit of Modernism 60's (Mid-Century Modern) and Art Deco. Semicircular back is decorated with decorative carnations. The national version of the Ibis chair from Brabbu (Portuguese factory). Link to the manufacturer's website: https://www.lavsit.ru/product/feliks-powder-pink/
